item.title: Discover Weekly
item.description: Copy excel data straight into R dataframes Quicker than quick… Copy data in excel and straight into an R dataframe! I won’t need this data ever again, so why bother saving and loading a file? read.table(file = "clipboard" , sep = "\t" , header = TRUE)

item.title: About
item.description: I used to be a QI geophysicist in the oil industry but decided to go back and start at the bottom of the ladder again to become a data scientist.
